Class SocketWrapper

java.lang.Object
kp.web.sockets.wrapper.SocketWrapper
Direct Known Subclasses:
InsecureSocketWrapper, SecureSocketWrapper
public abstract class SocketWrapper extends Object
Wrapper class for managing a ServerSocket.

    • runServer

      public abstract void runServer(Phaser phaser, String content, int number)
      Runs the server.
      Parameters:
      phaser - the Phaser to signal the end of the operation
      content - the content to be processed by the server
      number - an identifier number
